attributes.action: TV and adverts sending out wrong messages to young and gullible adults (i.e. Lies,theft,loose sex etc.)
attributes.additional_details:
If in this country we wish to Educate ALL people to be Lawful and have Respect for Others.
Then TV Adverts/soaps,  newspapers/magazines should be better controlled , they are sending out all the wrong messages to young children ,youths and gullible adults (i.e.Dishonesty,violence,theft,greed,loose sex etc. are all perfectly correct)
